Work Section Coming Soon, Latest Update
September 02, 2015

I finally got around to updating my website recently - as you can probably tell. I know what you're thinking though, "where the hell is your work?" I'm working on an overhaul for that - the old work was just presented poorly. Look for that in a few months.

Some news, as of mid-July I've been working as a UX Designer at LiquidPlanner, a project management software company. So far it has been a challenging and fun experience.

-Edward
